title: Chevin companion
content: Hello, I´m looking for a companion to the tech sans Chevin, to be used in headlines. Any ideas? They should differ a lot but still go nicely together..
author: Toby

comments.content:
Will the companion typeface be mixed in headings with the Chevin?  
or used as body?
No mixing in the same heading.. just an alternative headline face for the publication.

Tech sans? Can't see it myself.

Nick Cooke
